data.lyric:
[ti:Last Time I Say Sorry]
[ar:Kane Brown/John Legend]
[al:Last Time I Say Sorry]
[by:]

[00:00.00]Last Time I Say Sorry - Kane Brown/John Legend (约翰·传奇)
[00:01.69]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/John Stephens/Andrew Goldstein/Matt McGinn
[00:03.39]Composed by：Kane Brown/John Stephens/Andrew Goldstein/Matt McGinn
[00:05.09]I won't say I'm sorry over and over
[00:10.48]Can't just say I'm sorry I've gotta show you
[00:15.79]I won't do it again I'll prove my love is true
[00:20.78]I hope the last time I said sorry
[00:24.09]Is the last time I'll say sorry to you
[00:32.07]The first time I slept on the couch was our first New Year's Eve
[00:37.23]I heard words come out my mouth that I still can't believe
[00:42.47]Broken hearts and shattered champagne
[00:47.79]We both don't wanna feel that again
[00:53.15]The second I apologized you said "Boy I don't know"
[00:57.89]I said it 'cause I meant but you still wouldn't let it go
[01:03.49]So I swallow my pride see it from your side
[01:08.73]I promise I'll do the best I can do
[01:13.48]I won't say I'm sorry over and over
[01:18.92]Can't just say I'm sorry I've gotta show you
[01:24.21]I won't do it again I'll prove my love is true
[01:29.24]I hope the last time I said sorry
[01:32.56]Is the last time I'll say sorry to you
[01:36.50]No oh oh
[01:38.33]No oh oh
[01:40.54]To you
[01:41.48]No oh oh
[01:44.22]No oh oh
[01:45.83]The last time I said sorry
[01:48.36]Is the last time I'll say sorry
[01:51.21]If I could build a perfect world I'd only make you smile
[01:56.24]I'd hang the stars the sun and moon outside this room but I'll
[02:01.57]I'll never be perfect though I'm gonna try
[02:06.58]Oh I'm gonna do better I swear that I
[02:11.99]Won't say I'm sorry over and over
[02:16.95]Can't just say I'm sorry I've gotta show you
[02:22.15]I won't do it again I'll prove my love is true
[02:27.34]I hope the last time I said sorry
[02:30.60]Is the last time I'll say sorry to you
[02:34.58]No oh oh
[02:37.00]No oh oh
[02:38.51]To you
[02:39.66]No oh oh
[02:42.28]No oh oh
[02:43.87]The last time I said sorry
[02:46.29]Is the last time I'll say sorry to you
[02:50.39]No oh oh
[02:52.67]No oh oh
[02:54.36]To you
[02:55.46]No oh oh
[02:58.10]No oh oh
[02:59.25]I hope the last time I said sorry
[03:02.33]Is the last time I'd said sorry
[03:05.71]To you
data.trans:
[ti:Last Time I Say Sorry]
[ar:Kane Brown/John Legend]
[al:Last Time I Say Sorry]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.69]//
[00:03.39]//
[00:05.09]我不会说对不起 一遍又一遍
[00:10.48]只说抱歉怎么能够 我会证明给你看
[00:15.79]我不会再犯 我会证明我对你的爱绝无半分敷衍
[00:20.78]我希望我上次说的对不起
[00:24.09]就是我最后一次向你忏悔
[00:32.07]我第一次睡在沙发就是我们过的第一个新年前夜
[00:37.23]我听到从我嘴里说出来的话 我仍然不敢相信
[00:42.47]破碎的心和洒落一地的香槟
[00:47.79]我们都不想再体会了
[00:53.15]我道歉的那一刻 你仍难以平复不肯相信我
[00:57.89]我既然道歉了就是真心忏悔 可你不依不饶
[01:03.49]我只得放弃自己的尊严 站在你的角度考虑
[01:08.73]我保证我会尽我所能
[01:13.48]我不会说对不起 一遍又一遍
[01:18.92]只说抱歉怎么能够 我会证明给你看
[01:24.21]我不会再犯 我会证明我对你的爱绝无半分敷衍
[01:29.24]我希望我上次说的对不起
[01:32.56]就是我最后一次向你忏悔

[01:38.33]//
[01:40.54]向你忏悔
[01:41.48]//
[01:44.22]//
[01:45.83]我上次说的对不起
[01:48.36]就是我最后一次忏悔
[01:51.21]如果我能创建一个完美世界 我只想博你一笑
[01:56.24]哪怕让我将那星辰皓月似火骄阳悬挂你房前 也在所不辞
[02:01.57]尽管我永远做不到完美 但我会尽力尝试
[02:06.58]我会做得更好的 我发誓
[02:11.99]我不会说对不起 一遍又一遍
[02:16.95]只说抱歉怎么能够 我会证明给你看
[02:22.15]我不会再犯 我会证明我对你的爱绝无半分敷衍
[02:27.34]我希望我上次说的对不起
[02:30.60]就是我最后一次向你忏悔
